entry.tran: 有吸引力的;有趣的;动人的
entry.def: Someone or something that is appealing is pleasing and attractive.

example.ex: There was a sense of humour to what he did that I found very appealing...
example.tran: 他举手投足间流露出一种幽默感，我觉得很有魅力。
那是个十分吸引人的想法。

entry.def: An appealing expression or tone of voice indicates to someone that you want help, advice, or approval.

example.ex: She gave him a soft appealing look that would have melted solid ice.
example.tran: 她恳求地看了他一眼，温柔的眼神足以融化坚冰。

means.word_mean: 1. able to attract interest or draw favorable attention;

sentences.sentence: "He added an appealing and memorable figure to popular American mythology"- Vincent Starrett
"the idea of having enough money to retire at fifty is very appealing"

means.word_mean: 2. (of characters in literature or drama) evoking empathic or sympathetic feelings;

sentences.sentence: "the appealing and frightened look worn by an injured dog"
"she holds out her hand for money, importunate, insistent"

auth_sentence.content: This album is highly appealing on three main levels.
auth_sentence.res_content: This album is highly appealing on three main levels.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This album is highly appealing on three main levels.

auth_sentence.content: This is why these results are so very appealing.

Sentence.sentence: The past 15 years or so have been a noticeable period of improvement for food in England," the English chef says, citing the trend in British cuisine for better ingredients, preparation and cooking methods, and more appealing presentation.
Why did the woman find the job appealing?
Starting in the 1980s, skill in finance grew in importance, and, as depicted in the news media and the movies, became a more appealing source of income.
In the early 20th century, few things were more appealing than the promise of scientific knowledge.

means.word_mean: 有魅力的;动人的; 吸引人的; 有感染力的; 令人感兴趣的

sentences.en: I find his manner very appealing.
sentences.cn: 我发现他的举止非常有吸引力。

sentences.en: The large salary made their offer even more appealing to him.
sentences.cn: 高薪使他们的提议对他更具吸引力。
